# NextJS

Next.js is a React framework that enables several extra features, including server-side rendering and generating static websites for React based web applications.

## Example Application

An example Next.js application that connects to the AdventureWorks database and displays key performance indicators (KPIs) and AI-generated insights using Gemini can be found in this GitHub repository:

- [GitHub Repo](https://github.com/kirenz/nextjs-mssql-gemini)
